snippet.title: DEPRISION | Presentation Part II Official Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Today, we unveil a brief preview of DEPRISION | Presentation Part II Official Announcement Teaser. We're excited to announce that on Saturday, July 26, 2025, within the next 14 months, we'll be presenting the official second part, bringing DEPRISION to its definitive final version.

This presentation will showcase the final game, including the first trailer and 4 additional trailers that will be scheduled for release as appropriate, along with the release date, pre-order options, available platforms, system requirements, and editions. All information can be found at https://deprisiongame.com/.

While there's still some time ahead, we typically announce our events and releases with about a year's notice. Hence, we're launching this announcement today.

We hope you enjoy it. - The AleProgramadorStudios Team.

Find DEPRISION on:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1804730/DEPRISION/
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/deprision-1dc41e
Official website: https://deprisiongame.com/
X (formerly known as Twitter): https://twitter.com/deprisiongame

Find AleProgramadorStudios on: 

lnk.bio: https://lnk.bio/AleProgramadorStudios
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/aleprogramadorstudios/
X (formerly known as Twitter): https://twitter.com/AleGamesStudios
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/aleprogramadorstudios
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@aleprogramadorstudiossrl
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@reviseent/featured
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alegamesstudiossrl/

It serves as the company's platform to share information about its commercial products. Access is granted to the press, which has a channel with specific materials for its use.
